document.title: DISCUSSION GUIDE
document.focus_groups: WINSTON HISPANIC FOCUS GROUPS (Miami and San Antonio)

I.title: Introduction
points: How session works
Introduction of moderator
Introduction of participants
Company disclaimer

II.title: Consumer Background
points: Household composition.
How important is the family and friends.
How important is religion/church.
How important is your job; what is its most important aspect/attribute; what do you see as your future in the job.
Do you identify with/are in contact mostly with Hispanics or Anglos.
What do you believe are the roles of men/women in your family/society.
When shopping, how important is a brand name; do you prefer certain brands; why.

III.title: Smoking Habits
points: How long have you been smoking.
How often do you smoke and how much.
When do you smoke; in presence of your family/friends.
What brands have you smoked; why did you change.
How long have you smoked your current brand why/how did you change brands.
What style of cigarettes do you smoke; is the pack important.
Do you purchase cigarettes by pack/carton; why.
Where do you purchase them is price a consideration.
Are you concerned about smoking-related hazards to your health.

IV.title: Brand Images
points: What type of person smokes (1 Winston, 2 Marlboro, and 3 Newport).
For example, are these people older, younger, all ages.
Male, female.
Professional, non-professional.
Successful, rich.
Independent, sociable.
Macho, masculine.
Hispanic, Anglo, Black.
